english.segment1: Here we stand with our hand up. high. (Let the glory come down.). Give us a reason to testify. (Let. the glory come down.) Oh, break. the chains, tear down the walls. (Let the glory come down.) We. wanna feel it when the spirit falls. (Let the glory come down.)
english.segment2: Oh, we sing glory, glory, let the. glory come down. Oh, glory, glory, let the glory come down.
english.segment3: With a force that we cant. explain. (Let the glory come. down.) Oh, let it fall like a holy. rain. (Let the glory come down.). OH, bring it on, bring it strong, bring us to our knees. (Let the. glory come down.) Show us Your. presence, Holy Spirit, please. (Let the glory come down.)
english.segment4: Oh, we sing glory, glory, let the. glory come down. Oh, glory. glory, let the glory come down.
english.segment5: Oh, we sing glory, glory, let the. glory come down. Oh, glory. glory, let the glory come down.
english.segment6: Now were gonna praise His. name. (Praise His holy name.). Let the glory come down. (Praise. His holy name.) Let the glory. come down. and down, and. down. (Praise His holy name.). Let the glory come down. (Praise. His holy name.) Praise Him, let. the glory come down.
english.segment7: Theres a hung down in our. souls. (Let the glory come down.). Glory, let us see where the glory. rolls. (Let the glory come down.)
english.segment8: Oh, we sing glory, glory, let the. glory come down. Oh, glory. glory, let the glory come down.
english.segment9: Oh, we sing glory, glory, let the. glory come down. Oh, glory. glory, let the glory come down.
english.segment10: Break the chains - we want to. testify. Bring it on, bring it. strong. All the glory, let the glory. come down.
